thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-BGIS Will Not Proceed With Carillion Agreement

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-BGIS Will Not Proceed With Carillion Agreement
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - BGIS:
* BGIS PROVIDES UPDATE ON UK TRANSACTION * SAYS AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE PORTFOLIO OF CARILLION FACILITY MANAGEMENT CONTRACTS IN U.K. WILL NOT BE PROCEEDING​
* SAYS CARILLION ‍AGREEMENT WILL NOT BE PROCEEDING AS CERTAIN CLOSING CONDITIONS HAVE NOT BEEN MET​
* SAYS WHILE CO IS DISAPPOINTED WITH CARILLION DEAL NOT PROCEEDING, CONTINUE TO PURSUE OPPORTUNITIES TO GROW GLOBAL BUSINESS INTO U.K. Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
